s.text: The WP , once again flashing its command of Beltway exits, leads with Sammy Sosa hitting two home runs to tie Mark McGwire.
In its Sosa off-lead, the NYT adds that unlike with McGwire's record shots, baseball authorities had not put identifying marks on the game balls Sosa hit out.
Primakov stated his priorities include the timely payment of salaries and benefits, and that it is unacceptable for most Russians to live below the poverty line.
That number is added to today in a significant way: USAT 's lead editorial says Clinton should quit because "a president who puts his interests above the nation's cannot lead."
